name: mega-anklet
effect: Unused.  This is Zinnia's Key Stone in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire, but it cannot be obtained by the player.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This anklet contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to
Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This anklet contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to
Mega Evolve in battle.

This anklet contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to
Mega Evolve in battle.
